class.name: Interval

javadoc.text: The lower bound of the interval.
The upper bound of the interval.

javadoc.param: lower lower bound of the interval
upper upper bound of the interval

javadoc.text: Get the lower bound of the interval.
Get the lower bound of the interval.
Get the upper bound of the interval.
Get the upper bound of the interval.
Get the size of the interval.
Get the length of the interval.
Get the barycenter of the interval.
Get the midpoint of the interval.
Check a point with respect to the interval.
javadoc.param: tolerance tolerance below which points are considered to * belong to the boundary
javadoc.return: a code representing the point status: either {@link Location#INSIDE}, {@link Location#OUTSIDE} or {@link Location#BOUNDARY}
